MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Castle Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.15pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Bankside Industrial Estate substation to investigate a blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:12pm on Monday 1st March 2021.
